definition: lit. to restring one's bow/to reform and start over again
to change or replace/to experience/one of the five two-hour periods into which the night was formerly divided/watch (e.g. of a sentry or guard)
to open up/to spread/sheet of paper/classifier for flat objects, sheet/classifier for votes

sentences.english: Making a fresh start manifesting the past ages steadiness, is hard , struggle , dim , lonely.
sentences.chinese: 更张显出旧时代的稳重，艰苦，奋斗，暗淡，孤独。

definition: to continue the same old routine/to carry on just as before/to procrastinate
change of string, move out of rut (idiom); dramatic change of direction/to dance to a different tune
start and development/thread (of a story)/general outline/clue
to discard the old and introduce the new (idiom); to innovate
to deteriorate/to decline/to slump/also written 陵夷
